data.message:
You can try and be a hero
Please the audience
Make them love you
But when the show is over
And the people leave you
You ain't a hero anymore
The empty chairs
Come to haunt you

You have a look at your past 
You played a character of a star
Leather jackets and fast cars
Love letters gave you company
No need of alarms
They call you in morning
Just to wake you
People seem to love you
No one tries to feel you
No one knows the real you

The director says cut 
And the dream is over
No one wants to pull you closer
And you definitely can't afford a rover
What's app turned on you
You can only see a single tick
Come on for real ?
Why can't I see her last seen ?
Told you about my story
You were like don't worry I know what you mean
Never mind I'll find someone like you
Cause now there's no one
Saying hello from the other side
But I'm still friends with the monster
Doesn't matter if I can't see the light

replies.message: What song is this
I wrote it bro do you like it ?
Meh, keep working bro
Just getting started

I don't wanna be rich or famous.
 I only want lyrical annihilation.
Half of my fan base
aint even seen a day outside the basement.
Ain't none of you heard of the concept of ''Rhyming''?

Guys I really love Eminem could use some guidelines from fellow fans 

Mamma walked in on me
I was gonna slit my fucking wrist man 
All I wanted to talk to her you know
All I needed was a fucking friend .

She said son believe in God
Pray to him he'll help you
I wish she hugged me and said
son don't be stupid you know that we need you

Desperate times call for desperate measures
I know I'll get over this
But I really don't want to
Who wants to breathe in a world
Where even love comes to haunt you

Plug in the earphones
And listen to my cure
Take a deep breath with a sigh
And wipe away the tears
I'm not afraid
Man Eminem is such a legend
What could I do without this tunes
What would stop me from sliding the blade and
Well I don't mind seeing a lot of red
I just don't want no drama
Why did you do it ?
That's not the way !
They know a fuck about my life
But that's what they'll say
I know something is wrong with use structure . Please tell me what

Stop using Gas and Oil now, here are your choices of Electric Vehicles: Nissan Leaf is an All-Electric - 107 Miles of range per charge and charges in 21 to 26 hours at 110V, 4 to 6 hours at 220V, 0.5 hours at 440V. 2016 Kia Soul EV goes 93 miles on a charge and comes standard with DC Fast Charge which will charge in 30 Minutes! Ford Focus Electric goes 110 miles per charge!!!2017 Chevrolet Bolt EV, with an all electric range of 238 miles! Follow Chevrolet Electric for Volt and Bolt news. Chevrolet Volt is the electric car with a backup plan. It runs on an electric charge and generates additional electric power through a gas-powered generator when the battery runs out — giving you the confidence to go as far as you want. Volt has an electric range of 53 miles, the gas generator kicks on after that to bring the total range to 420 miles. With Volt you can make most trips with no gas needed, but you can still go far if you need to by using a little bit of gas. The BMW i3 is available in two versions depending on your mobility needs. The purely electric BMW i3 gets up to 114 miles per charge while the BMW i3 with Range Extender gets up to 180 miles in total range. Tesla has the best Electric Cars by far(Very fast acceleration, High Tech, Very Safe, 265 mile range standard and 315 optional), but they are much more expensive until the Model 3 arrives in 2018. Tesla has a nice lease offer if it's too expensive to buy. Tesla leases Rooftop Solar Panels, and Solar integrated Roofs for your Home. Tesla sells a PowerWall battery system used to store your solar power for use at night. Rayton Solar's new technology will reduce the cost of making quality Solar Panels, so more people can afford them.
